statements: SELECT * FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE humidity < 70 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT id, soil_moisture FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE light_intensity >= 500 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 60
SELECT id, light_intensity FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE soil_moisture < 40 ORDER BY light_intensity DESC
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE temperature >= 25 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT MAX(temperature) as max_temp, MIN(humidity) as min_humidity FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE soil_moisture < 0.4
SELECT id, AVG(temperature) as avg_temp, AVG(humidity) as avg_humidity FROM greenhouse_conditions GROUP BY id HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, soil_moisture FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE light_intensity > 100
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_conditions ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, humidity FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT plant_id, species, growth_stage FROM plant_data WHERE water_consumption_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY plant_id;
SELECT * FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60;
SELECT plant_id, species, last_watering_date FROM plant_data ORDER BY last_watering_date DESC;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT * FROM plant_data WHERE growth_stage = 'flowering' OR growth_stage = 'mature' ORDER BY last_watering_date ASC
SELECT id, light_intensity FROM greenhouse_conditions WHERE light_intensity >= 500 ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM plant_data WHERE species = 'Monstera deliciosa'
SELECT plant_id, species, water_consumption_rate FROM plant_data WHERE water_consumption_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY species ASC
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseSensorData;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM GreenhouseSensorData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT greenhouse_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM GreenhouseSensorData GROUP BY greenhouse_id;
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseSettings WHERE automatic_watering = TRUE;
SELECT plant_name, quantity FROM PlantInventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity, timestamp FROM GreenhouseSensorData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT * FROM GreenhouseSensorData JOIN GreenhouseSettings ON GreenhouseSensorData.greenhouse_id = GreenhouseSettings.greenhouse_id WHERE GreenhouseSettings.temperature_threshold > 20 AND GreenhouseSensorData.humidity < GreenhouseSettings.humidity_threshold;
SELECT plant_name, quantity FROM PlantInventory WHERE supplier_id = 5 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, greenhouse_id FROM GreenhouseSensorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-02-28 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM GreenhouseSettings WHERE automatic_watering = true;
SELECT id, temperature FROM Temperature
SELECT * FROM Humidity ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT light_intensity, id FROM LightIntensity WHERE light_intensity > 100
SELECT water_level FROM WaterLevel WHERE water_level < 0.5
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM Temperature JOIN Humidity ON Temperature.id = Humidity.id
SELECT * FROM Temperature ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, humidity FROM Humidity WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM LightIntensity WHERE light_intensity BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000
SELECT id, water_level FROM WaterLevel WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)

SELECT id, temperature, humidity, light_intensity, water_level FROM Temperature JOIN Humidity ON Temperature.id = Humidity.id JOIN LightIntensity ON Temperature.id = LightIntensity.id JOIN WaterLevel ON Temperature.id = WaterLevel.id
SELECT * FROM Greenhouse
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM Greenhouse
SELECT plant_name, species FROM Plants ORDER BY species ASC
SELECT sensor_id, location, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location = 'Greenhouse A'
SELECT alert_id, alert_type, message FROM Alerts
SELECT * FROM Greenhouse WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY humidity DESC
SELECT plant_name, species FROM Plants WHERE growth_stage = 'Mature'
SELECT location, sensor_type FROM Sensors WHERE location IN ('Greenhouse A', 'Greenhouse B')
SELECT * FROM Readings WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND temperature < 20
SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY reading_id DESC
